hero.title: AOREN Law Firm
hero.subtitle: Professional Legal Consultancy
hero.description: With our experienced team of lawyers, we provide the best solutions to your legal needs. We are with you with our expert team in commercial, labor, family and criminal law.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Experienced and expert team of lawyers
team.description: Our lawyers with many years of experience in the field of law work to provide the highest quality legal service to our clients.

expertise.title: Areas of Expertise
expertise.subtitle: Wide range of legal services
expertise.description: With our team specialized in different branches of law, we meet all the legal needs of our clients.

commercial.title: Commercial Law
commercial.description: Consultancy services on company establishment, mergers, acquisitions and commercial disputes.

labor.title: Labor Law
labor.description: Legal support on employment contracts, workers' rights, work accidents and employer obligations.

family.title: Family Law
family.description: Professional solutions for divorce, custody, alimony and family legal issues.

criminal.title: Criminal Law
criminal.description: Experienced lawyer support in criminal accusations, defense and criminal cases.

execution.title: Execution and Bankruptcy Law
execution.description: Legal consultancy in debt collection, execution procedures and bankruptcy cases.

mediation.title: Mediation
mediation.description: Professional mediation services for out-of-court resolution of disputes.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Reliable legal consultancy
about.description: As AOREN Law Firm, we are a law firm that has adopted the principle of providing the highest quality legal service to our clients and serves with an experienced and expert team of lawyers.

offices.title: Our Offices
offices.subtitle: Get service from our nearest office
offices.description: With our offices located in different cities of Turkey, we provide easy access to our clients.

istanbul.title: Istanbul Office
istanbul.address: Levent District, Büyükdere Avenue No: 201, Şişli/Istanbul

digital.title: AOREN Digital Services
digital.subtitle: Legal solutions with technology
digital.description: We offer modern solutions to our clients with our innovative legal services that meet the requirements of the digital age.

responsibility.title: Corporate Social Responsibility
responsibility.subtitle: Our mission to add value to society
responsibility.description: In addition to our legal services, we continue to create value with our social responsibility projects.

careers.title: Careers at AOREN
careers.subtitle: Professional development opportunities
careers.description: Shape your legal career with AOREN by joining our dynamic and growing team.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us
contact.description: You can contact us for your legal consultancy needs.

company.title: AOREN Law Firm
company.description: With our high-impact legal team, we aim to provide the highest quality legal service to our clients.
